entities.description: The type of agency that has jurisdiction, such as city, county, university, state police, etc.
Indicates whether the respondent is in a core city or not.
A specific code representing various agencies.
Number of respondents for each jurisdiction type or core city status.

relationships.description: Indicates the type of jurisdiction that covers the area.
Indicates the core city status of the respondent.
Connects an agency to its corresponding code label.
Indicates the number of respondents with specific jurisdiction types or core city status.
